duties_responsibilities.duty: Development and maintenance of program timeline.
Revision of program plans and milestones according to prioritization.
Develop a robust project plan and integrate work stream project Gantts for the overall program.
Coordination with program workstream leaders to manage executions.
Development and maintenance of program risk logs.
Weekly meetings with program work streams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Health Sciences, Business or Financial Management, or relevant field
